response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value to us, reflecting years of innovation and dedication. Given its worth to both parties, we propose a transaction price of $950,000. We believe this offer strikes a balance between fairness and profitability, allowing you to secure a remarkable asset at a competitive rate. Should you find this proposal favorable, please let us know promptly so we can proceed with the necessary arrangements. Thank you for considering our offer.", "product_price": 950000}
